warning.title: Warning
warning.description: There is a problem getting data from the server.

error.title: Node Service Error
error.description: The node service is currently experiencing an error. Please check your system configuration or contact support.

unavailable.title: Node status unavailable
unavailable.description: Could not fetch the node status. Please try again later.

stopping.title: Stopping node
stopping.description: The node is stopping. Please wait a moment.

stop_delay.title: Stop taking longer than expected
stop_delay.description: The node is taking longer than expected to stop. Please wait a little more or check the connection.

starting.title: Starting node
starting.description: The node is starting. Please wait a moment.

start_delay.title: Start taking longer than expected
start_delay.description: The node is taking longer than expected to start. Please wait a little more or check the connection.

offline.title: Node is offline
offline.description: The node is currently offline. You can start it from the top menu if needed.

connection_issue.title: Node connection issue
connection_issue.description: The node is currently offline, but it should be online. Please check the connection or try restarting.

unexpected.title: Unexpected node status
unexpected.description: The node is online, but it was requested to stop. Please verify its state or restart.

panel.connect_tooltip_loading: To connect to your node you need to enable the Allow LAN connections first and wait for the availability of the node.

unavailable.title: Miner status unavailable
unavailable.description: Could not fetch the miner status. Please try again later.

stopping.title: Stopping miner
stopping.description: The miner is stopping. Please wait a moment.

stop_delay.title: Stop taking longer than expected
stop_delay.description: The miner is taking longer than expected to stop. Please wait a little more or check the connection.

starting.title: Starting miner
starting.description: The miner is starting. Please wait a moment.

start_delay.title: Start taking longer than expected
start_delay.description: The miner is taking longer than expected to start. Please wait a little more or check the connection.

offline.title: Miner is offline
offline.description: The miner is currently offline. You can start it from the top menu if needed.

connection_issue.title: Miner connection issue
connection_issue.description: The miner is currently offline, but it should be online. Please check the connection or try restarting.

unexpected.title: Unexpected miner status
unexpected.description: The miner is online, but it was requested to stop. Please verify its state or restart.

banner.title: SOLO LAN Mining
banner.description: Point any Bitcoin Miner on your local network to your Solo Pool with the following URL: {address}:3333 Username: <bitcoin address>

info.title: Solo Info
info.daily_chance: Daily Chance of Solving a Solo Block

unavailable.title: Miner status unavailable
unavailable.description: Could not fetch the miner status. Please try again later.

stopping.title: Stopping miner
stopping.description: The miner is stopping. Please wait a moment.

stop_delay.title: Stop taking longer than expected
stop_delay.description: The miner is taking longer than expected to stop. Please wait a little more or check the connection.

starting.title: Starting miner
starting.description: The miner is starting. Please wait a moment.

start_delay.title: Start taking longer than expected
start_delay.description: The miner is taking longer than expected to start. Please wait a little more or check the connection.

offline.title: Miner is offline
offline.description: The miner is currently offline. You can start it from the top menu if needed.

connection_issue.title: Miner connection issue
connection_issue.description: The miner is currently offline, but it should be online. Please check the connection or try restarting.

unexpected.title: Unexpected miner status
unexpected.description: The miner is online, but it was requested to stop. Please verify its state or restart.

waiting_share.title: Waiting for first share
waiting_share.description: Please wait until the first share is received.

ck_pool_disconnected.title: CK Pool Disconnected
ck_pool_disconnected.description: Please check your node connection and the CK Pool status.

node_not_synced.title: Node not synced
node_not_synced.description: Node needs to be synced to correctly mine on SOLO mode. Please check your node for problems.

eco.title: ECO
eco.description: In ECO mode your miner will be at its most efficient, but its hashrate will be slightly slower. This mode is recommended, and will produce the least amount of noise and heat.

balanced.title: BALANCED
balanced.description: BALANCED mode is a good compromise between hashrate, efficiency, and noise.

turbo.title: TURBO
turbo.description: In TURBO mode your miner will be the least efficient, but its hashrate will be the highest. This mode is only recommended for expert users, and you should monitor your miner for possible overheating. The fan can get loud in this mode.

custom.title: CUSTOM
custom.description: In CUSTOM mode you can set your own frequency and voltage. This mode is only recommended for expert users.
custom.warning_description: The Apollo comes with tuned preset values (above), which offer a good range of operating modes. By selecting custom you risk damaging your device and FutureBit will not be responsible for any or all damage caused by over-clocking or over-volting

power.title: Power
power.description: You can set your miner custom power or reset to default value.

frequency.title: Frequency
frequency.description: You can set your miner custom frequency or reset to default value.

fan.title: Miner fan settings
fan.description: Adjust the fan speed or set it to automatic

low.title: Temperature to start fan
low.description: This is the temperature needed to start the fan.

high.title: Temperature for max fan speed
high.description: This is the temperature needed to set the fan at maximum speed.

power_led.title: Front Status Light
power_led.description: Turn off/on the front status led. Note: your miner will be restarted to apply.

node.title: Bitcoin node settings

tor_mode.title: TOR mode
tor_mode.description: Connect your Bitcoin Node over the Tor network to increase security and anonymity. Note: your node will be restarted to apply.

allow_lan.title: Allow LAN connections
allow_lan.description: Allow LAN connections to your Bitcoin Node to connect external wallets and services. Note: your node will be restarted to apply.

node_config.title: Bitcoin node configuration
node_config.description: Add additional configuration lines to the bitcoin.conf file. (Note: this section is for advanced users, and no validation is performed. Please check Bitcoin Core documentation for valid options.)

node.solo_mining_warning: You have solo mining enabled, it is suggested to turn off tor for solo mining. Bitcoin nodes over the tor network propagate blocks slower, and there is a higher chance of orphaning a block

wifi.title: Wifi settings
wifi.description: Connect your system controller to a Wifi instead using ethernet

password.title: Lockscreen
password.description: Change the password to access the dashboard

error.required: The password must have 8 characters at least

backup.title: Backup settings
backup.description: Create a backup file of dashboard, miner and pools configurations

restore.title: Restore settings
restore.description: Restore all configurations from a backup file

format.title: Format Node SSD
format.description: Use this tool for formatting and setting up your Node NVMe SSD

pool.title: Pooled settings
pool.description: Manage pools configuration for your miner

solo.title: SOLO settings
solo.description: Mine directly to your Bitcoin node
solo.mining_mode_description: Enable solo mining mode to mine directly to your own Bitcoin Node. Note: your node will be restarted to apply.
solo.tor_warning: You have tor enabled, it is suggested to turn off tor for solo mining. Bitcoin nodes over the tor network propagate blocks slower, and there is a higher chance of orphaning a block
solo.node_not_synced: Your Bitcoin node is not running or not fully synced. You can enable solo mining only after your node is fully synced.
solo.invalid_address: Please add a valid Bitcoin address
solo.incompatible_address: Warning: P2WSH and P2TR Bitcoin address are not valid for SOLO mining. Please add a different Bitcoin address

block_found.message: Il tuo miner ha trovato un blocco Bitcoin!
block_found.description: Questo è un risultato straordinario nel mondo del mining di Bitcoin. Hai minato con successo un intero blocco e guadagnato la ricompensa completa!

reset.title: Reset del flag blocco trovato
reset.description: La notifica del blocco trovato è stata resettata
reset.error: Errore durante il reset del flag blocco trovato: {error}

stopping.title: Arresto del miner
stopping.description: Il miner si sta arrestando. Attendere un momento.

starting.title: Avvio del miner
starting.description: Il miner si sta avviando. Attendere un momento.

online.title: Il miner è online
online.description: Il miner è online e operativo.

offline.title: Il miner è offline
offline.description: Il miner è stato arrestato con successo.

stopping.title: Arresto del nodo
stopping.description: Il nodo si sta arrestando. Attendere un momento.

starting.title: Avvio del nodo
starting.description: Il nodo si sta avviando. Attendere un momento.

online.title: Il nodo è online
online.description: Il nodo è online e operativo.

offline.title: Il nodo è offline
offline.description: Il nodo è stato arrestato con successo.
